🧠 Types of Crypto ETFs:

→ Futures ETF
Tracks the price using crypto derivatives.
(Already approved in the US & India)

→ Spot ETF
Backed 1:1 with real Bitcoin or ETH.
(Recently approved — HUGE deal!) https://t.co/QaWse4mFuN

💡 So what’s a Crypto ETF?

A Crypto ETF lets you invest in Bitcoin, Ethereum, or other crypto assets — without holding the tokens directly.

Perfect for:
✅ Institutions
✅ Traditional investors
✅ Newbies scared of wallets & seed phrases https://t.co/AaTSBYsuTm
